title: WSI_DeID SEER DeID Upload File schema
description: The schema to validate the DeID Upload CSV file for the SEER WSI_DeID workflow.

TokenID.title: TokenID
TokenID.description: This ID should be used when communicating with IMS, in the Subject Manifest, DeID Upload File, and DeID Export File, and in the file names for the pathology reports and the WSIs.

Proc_Seq.title: Proc_Seq
Proc_Seq.description: Sequence number of the procedure for the subject when available reports are in chronological order.

Proc_Type.title: Proc_Type
Proc_Type.description: Indicates the procedure type for the slides (i.e. Biopsy, Cytology Cell Block, Resection)

Spec_Site.title: Spec_Site
Spec_Site.description: Indicates the specimen site for the slides requested/submitted.  This uses the ICD-0-3.2 Topography Code and text location

Slide_ID.title: Slide_ID
Slide_ID.description: Indicates the sequence of the slides for a given subject across all specimens.

ImageID.title: ImageID
ImageID.description: Concatenation of TokenID, Proc_Seq, and Slide_ID.

InputFileName.title: InputFileName
InputFileName.description: Name of file and file type as received from scanning facility.
